mapper.insert: insert into reply (id, replyer, content) values (id_num.nextval, #{replyer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, updateDate = sysdate where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, content, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from reply where id = #{id} order by id asc
mapper.insert: insert into comments (id, replyer, content) values (id_num.nextval, #{replyer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update comments set content = #{content}, updateDate = sysdate where id = #{id}
